trends: There has been one other sighting in East Greenwich
There were no other sightings in East Greenwich on or around June 7th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS COMING IN FROM THE AMERICAN FROG SOCIETY MEETING AND I SPOTTED A UFO! I FIRST NOTICED THE OBJECT WHEN IT LANDED IN FRONT OF MY CAR! I THOUGHT IT WAS A GIANT BOWL OF SPAGHETTIOs. IT LOOKED LIKE A BOWL SHAPED AIRCRAFT, THAT WAS ALL I COULD GATHER BEFORE IT ABDUCTED ME. I WAS EXTREMELY TERRIFIED AFTER SEEING THE OBJECT AND BEING ABDUCTED BY IT. I WAS HELD HOSTAGE FOR WHAT APPEARED TO BE ONLY MINUTES, BUT IT WAS ACTUALLY 7 YEARS. I AWOKE BEING A FULLY MATURED ADULT. I HAD NO CONTROL OVER MY OWN BODY AND I POOPED MY SELF A LOT. ALLLOOOTTT. I LOST SITE OF THE EVIL AIRSHIP AFTER IT HAD DUMPED ME BACK AT THE PLACE THEY HAD ABDUCTED ME FROM. THE WORLD A DESOLATE WAISTLAND, I HAD NO CHOICE BUT TO HUMBLY RETURN TO MY MICRO-APARTMENT THAT I WAS CURSED TO BY THE MAYOR OF NEW YORK CITY.
